title: Spain Gross Household Saving Rate
description: Household Saving Rate in Spain increased to 16.13 percent in the second quarter of 2022 from -1.49 percent in the first quarter of 2022. Personal Savings in Spain averaged 8.39 percent from 1999 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 33.48 percent in the second quarter of 2020 and a record low of -6.74 percent in the first quarter of 2008. In Spain, Personal Savings correspond to the income saved by persons during a certain period of time. This page provides - Spain Personal Savings - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
